name: Troll-Zilla Alpha version
description:
TIP:   When on window fullscreen online just press the (Esc) button to get out of full screen or just hold the (Windows Key) down and press the (Tab) button... This will pop up all open windows and you can choose what to open or close

This is just a game idea for a level I am thinking about creating more levels and publishing when I have made more content, all audio I created with SonicFire Pro (export licenses)

ANDROID MOBILE VERSION Double Click the (END) button in the START page will end the game

animations keyframed in iClonev7 and Reallusion CCv3 exported as image sequences

programming in Construct 3

other graphic artwork Corel PaintShop Pro v 2022

3d fonts created in MotionStudio 3d (older software)
